contentrichtext.text: {{archive}} '''This page is an archive of the discussion surrounding the proposed deletion of the page entitled [[Arletty]].''' '''This page is kept as an historic record.''' '''The result of the debate was to keep the article.''' ---- Only ''narrowly'' misses criteria for speedy delete. One line of geneological data, no description of why they are notable, and three external links, two of which are to Google-translated versions of a web page. [[User:SWAdair|SWAdair]] | [[User talk:SWAdair|Talk ]] 10:08, 11 May 2004 (UTC) * I've reworked the stub. - [[User:Topbanana|TB]] 11:39, 11 May 2004 (UTC) * Keep. Now a good stub. Well done. [[User:Andrewa|Andrewa]] 13:40, 11 May 2004 (UTC) * I would even put this on [[Wikipedia:Pages needing attention|Needing Attention]]. [[User:Alcarillo|Alcarillo]] 14:12, 11 May 2004 (UTC) * Looks like a stub. Keep -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]|[[User talk:Cyrius|&#9998]] 23:26, May 11, 2004 (UTC) *In a few short hours this went from nearly speedy delete to an excellent stub. A keeper! - [[User:Lucky 6.9|Lucky 6.9]] 00:06, 12 May 2004 (UTC) * I just got back online and found the changes. Great job. Keep new version. [[User:SWAdair|SWAdair]] | [[User talk:SWAdair|Talk ]] 03:22, 12 May 2004 (UTC) ---- This page is now preserved as an archive of the debate up to the point of deletion and is no longer 'live'. Subsequent comments on the issue, the deletion or on the new method of assessing voting, should be placed on other relevant 'live' pages. '''Please do not edit this page'''. ----
